text: Can you help me delete my reservation for the Board Meeting on April 5th at 3:00 PM?
Sure, I can assist you with that. Let me check if I can find the API for that.

output.name: GetUserToken
output.desc_for_search: get user tokenGet the user token.

output.name: DeleteMeeting
output.description: This API allows users to delete a reservation for a meeting and remove the meeting information in the database.Function：Delete user's reservation for a meeting.Exception Handling：1. If the deletion is successful, return a success message.2. If the deletion fails, return a corresponding error message.

meeting_topic.description: The title of the meeting, no more than 50 characters.

start_time.description: The start time of the meeting, in the pattern of %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S

end_time.description: The end time of the meeting, in the pattern of %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S

location.description: The location where the meeting to be held, no more than 100 characters.

attendees.description: The attendees of the meeting, including names, positions and other information.

text: I need some information from you like the Meeting Topic, Start Time, End Time, Location, and Attendees.
The meeting topic is Board Meeting, start time is April 5th 2023 at 3:00 PM, end time is April 5th 2023 at 5:00 PM, location is Boardroom, and attendees are Board Members.
Thank you. I also need your username and password, please.
My username is admin and the password is adminpass.
Before proceeding it, I need to get your token for authentication.
Alright, I have received the token.
The reservation has been deleted successfully. Is there anything else I can help you with?
